item.description: I’ve always needed to track what I do at work each day. There are tons of fancy productivity apps out there, but here’s the problem: most office computers won’t let you install whatever you want. So I’m sharing a simple trick I’ve used for over a decade. It works on any Windows machine because it uses the basic Notepad app that’s already installed. The 3-Step Setup Create a new text file (call it something like dailyLog.
